name: Evacuate (Survival horror, Shooter)
description:
Hi, I am Ritvik Shukla, a solo developer and I've been working on this game for past 3 months. Evacuate is a Action, Shooter and Survival horror game in which you play as John Weak, who works for an organisation that takes private contracts of any kind.

You are tasked with evacuation of remaining scientists who are stuck in a zombie infested area due to an experiment gone wrong.

Note- You may encounter some bugs but nothing is game breaking!

Controls:

1,2,3,4 - Change weapon

Left Shift - Slow motion

Escape - Pause game (This shows all the controls)

You can change graphic settings from the pause menu...

Have Fun :)

The game will be free for 24 hrs only!!
